name: PubMed Search
description: Search PubMed for scientific/medical literature and return MEDLINE records.
author: Shinkai

entrez_email.description: Valid email for NCBI Entrez API rate limiting. Set in env ENTREZ_EMAIL if not provided here

query.description: PubMed search query. Supports MeSH terms, Boolean operators (AND, OR, NOT), and field tags [Title]

max_results.description: Number of results to return (1-15). Higher values take longer. Default: 15

status.description: Search status: success or error. Indicates if query executed successfully

query.description: Echo of executed search query for verification

message.description: Status message or error details if search failed

total_results.description: Total number of matching PubMed records found

showing.description: Number of records returned in this response (limited by max_results)

records.description: MEDLINE-formatted records of matching publications. Each record includes title, authors, abstract
